title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 400.1 - Application of rules of the workers' compensation board to the volunteer firefighters' benefit law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 400.1 - Application of rules of the workers' compensation board to the volunteer firefighters' benefit law

State Regulations

All rules of the board under the Workers' Compensation Law
are hereby made applicable to proceedings under the Volunteer Firefighters'
Benefit Law to the extent that such rules are not inconsistent with the

Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law or any future rule adopted by the board
thereunder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
400.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
